attributes.action: Give Captain Tom Moore recognition of his help to the NHS with a  Knighthood.
attributes.additional_details: Captain Tom Moore has been an inspiration to us all in this time of national crisis. He has so far raised over £8m by walking in his garden.  A true gent,

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
